title: Ubuntu 24.04 - Screen sharing not possible
body:
**Describe the bug**
It is not possible to share screen on Ubuntu 24.04.1.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open Teams
2. Enter any meeting
3. Try to share your screen
4. See the error "We couldn't access your camera"

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
![teams_sharing_ubuntu](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/40c29902-f1e3-42fe-bbd9-4218c97bb315)


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu LTS 
 - Installation package: snap
 - Version 24.04.1

**Teams Info**
![teams_info](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f5ef0b26-4624-44b4-a230-a0dda129197e)

**Teams Video is generally working**
![teams_video](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f271d57e-3b18-4711-aae7-371fde0f279f)


**Permissions**  
All App-Permissions are on.
![teams_permissions_snap](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/89384ab9-7d20-4ae7-b1b6-29133559c21a)
